participant_1.background:
I am close with my family, though I can be a bit overbearing at times.
i have never met my father.
I'm constantly tripping over my own feet, but I'm determined to make it as a wedding planner.
my favorite basketball team is the vancouver grizzlies.
I like to play video games with my friends to take my mind off of things.

participant_2.background:
I like to dye my hair blue because it reminds me of the ocean.
My dad and brother are my two main sources of support.
my wardrobe is all band tees.
I love going to farmer's markets with my friends because we can explore new foods and find fresh produce.
I love the challenge of a good fight, but I also enjoy the peace and quiet of practicing my flute.

content.text: Hi there!
Hey there, what's up?
Not much, just hanging out. What about you?
I just got back from a farmer's market. I got some fresh produce and some yummy treats!
Oh that's awesome! I love farmer's markets. What kind of treats did you get?
I got some apple cider donuts and some homemade granola. They were both so good!
Those sound delicious! I wish I had some now.
Me too! You should come with me next time.
I would love to! I love trying new things.
Great! We can make it a date.
Sounds like a plan!
What's your favorite thing to do at farmer's markets?
I love exploring all the different stalls and finding new things to try.
Me too! It's so much fun to find hidden gems.
I agree! It's also a great way to support local businesses.
That's true! I love supporting local farmers.
Me too! They work so hard to produce their goods.
Yes, they do! I'm so glad we're both passionate about farmer's markets.
Me too! They're the best.
I'm glad we met! We should do this again sometime.
I'd love to
